section: The Term of this Agreement shall be for a period of [* ****] years and [*****] months commencing the 1st day of September 2004 and terminating the [*****] day of [*****].
explanation: The term of the agreement is not clearly defined as the number of years and months are redacted. This makes it difficult to determine the exact duration of the contract and creates ambiguity regarding the termination date.

section: C."MANDATORY PRODUCTS" shall mean the following ADAMS GOLF PRODUCTS that CONSULTANT must exclusively play/use in all Champions/Senior Professional Golf Association (SPGA) and Professional Golf Association (PGA) events at all times: [***** ] Confidential Material redacted and filed separately with the Commission. 2 1.[*****] 2.Sufficient [*****] to maintain total minimum of [*****] ADAMS GOLF [*****] (includes [*****])[*****] at all times 3.[*****] 4.[*****] (CONSULTANT may continue to place the [*****] logo on the [*****] consistent with historical practice.)
explanation: The specific products that the consultant is required to use exclusively are not listed, due to redaction. This creates a contradiction as the contract mandates exclusive use of 'MANDATORY PRODUCTS', but fails to define what those products are.

section: In each and every calendar year of this Agreement, CONSULTANT shall achieve a satisfactory record of play in a minimum of [* ****] professional golf association events on the SPGA and/or PGA tour (which shall include both the PGA and SPGA Tour Skins Games). If for any reason, CONSULTANT should achieve a satisfactory record of play in less than [*****] SPGA and/or PGA tour events in a calendar year, he shall repay ADAMS GOLF an amount per event for each event under [*****] achieved in the given calendar year as follows:
explanation: The minimum number of events that the consultant must participate in to avoid penalty is redacted which means it is not clear. This creates a contradiction as the contract defines that there is a minimunm number of events, but does not clearly state the number of events.
